General.Name: N.C. Housing Public Company Limited
General.Description: N.C. Housing Public Company Limited operates as a real estate development company in Thailand. It develops and sells housing estates and land, detached houses, twin houses, townhouses, and condominiums; provides contractor, construction, and project and property management services; and rents space in club houses, health rehabilitation and senior care centers, etc. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand. N.C. Housing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of NCH 2555 Holding Company Limited.
General.Address: 1/765 Moo 17, Soi Amporn, Pathum Thani, Thailand, 12130
